## â„¹ï¸ About this repository

If you want your own OKRs tracker, you can [fork this repository](https://github.com/AnandChowdhary/okrs/fork) and set up the repository with the following file structure:

```
â”œâ”€â”€ README.md
â”œâ”€â”€ .github
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ workflows
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ node.yml
â””â”€â”€ okrs
    â”œâ”€â”€ 2019
    â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ 3.md
    â”‚   â””â”€â”€ 4.md
    â””â”€â”€ 2020
        â””â”€â”€ 1.md
```

Using GitHub Actions, `api.json` and `README.md` will be auto-generated, for example you can consume my API: https://anandchowdhary.github.io/okrs/api.json
